reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is fantastic! Her lectures are engaging and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is knowledgeable but his teaching style is a bit dry. The material can be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Modern History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is passionate about history and brings a lot of energy to her classes. However, her exams can be quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are hard to follow and he doesn't provide enough examples. The subject is difficult enough without extra obstacles.

reviews.subject: Computer Science Fundamentals
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is an excellent instructor with clear explanations and a lot of practical examples. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is very insightful and encourages deep thinking, but sometimes his lectures can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is good at explaining the basics but tends to rush through more complex topics. Her labs are well-organized though.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an amazing professor with a great sense of humor. His classes are always stimulating and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez covers the material thoroughly but her lectures can be monotonous. A bit more enthusiasm would help.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. White is very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject. His assignments are practical and interesting.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's teaching methods are unclear and she doesn't provide enough feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is incredibly enthusiastic and makes art history come alive. His lectures are always engaging and insightful.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas is knowledgeable but her lectures are sometimes hard to follow. The course could benefit from more structured materials.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is very thorough and provides a lot of real-world applications. His exams can be challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is engaging and her lectures are filled with relevant examples. The course workload is manageable.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is one of the best professors I've had. His classes are dynamic and he fosters a great classroom discussion environment.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Dr. Scott's explanations are often confusing and she doesn't offer enough help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is very passionate about the subject and provides a lot of valuable insights. The pace of the class is a bit fast though.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is incredibly supportive and offers great feedback on writing assignments. Her classes are inspiring and motivating.

reviews.subject: Theology
reviews.review: Dr. Young is knowledgeable but his teaching style can be quite traditional. The class could use more interactive elements.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. King presents the material in a very accessible way and her fieldwork examples are fascinating. The course is engaging overall.
